hero.title:
Building the <1>biggest Investment
Platform in the market

features.description: We leverage the buying power of our investment DAO and copy-investors community to get access to the <1>best investment deals in the market</1> at lower risk

feature1.title: Copy Invest
feature1.description: Copy-invest DAO members to automatically buy the same assets at the same prices and terms

feature2.title: Get investors
feature2.description: Boost your fundraising with accredited market leaders and scale your token distribution

feature3.title: Become a member
feature3.description: We use group buying power for large purchases from top projects, with refund options, and scale investments through community Copy-investments.

what.title: What is the Excited Investment DAO
what.description: At the core of our platform is the Excited investment DAO. <1>A community of hundreds of accredited investors</1>, all market veterans and leaders, working together to pool our influence and buying power to negotiate the <1>best investment deals in the market</1> with lower risk. We then share to our deal flow and allocations at the same exact terms with our copy-investor community

how.title: How Copy-Investing Works
how.description: All XCTD holders that are non members can participate in the same deals at the same terms as the DAO members through the Excited copy-investing mechanism. This is how it works:

highlights.label: For copy-investors
highlights.title: Get access to private round terms
highlights.description: By Copy-investing our market leaders you get to automatically mirror their investment portfolio. You will purchase the same assets they buy, at the same prices and terms.
points: Buy and delegate XCTD tokens to Copy-invest an Excited member
Fund the Copy-invest smart contract for seamless copy-investing
Automatically receive tokens to your wallet with the same terms as your member
Increase your group's XCTD share to grow investment allocation

highlights.label: For projects
highlights.title: Raise big tickets from a strong community
highlights.description: Get a boost to your fundraising round from a community of accredited market leaders and scale your token distribution
points: Backing from Excited Investment DAO members, accredited market insiders, and leaders
Token distribution to a large community of Copy-investors
Investment rounds with insurance for fairness and excitement
Ongoing support with listing, market making, and secondary market partners

highlights.label: For DAO members
highlights.title: Bigger buying power, lower risk, community scale
highlights.description: We leverage our group buying power to buy big tickets from leading projects, with refund options. We scale investments and token distribution with community Copy-investments
points: Hold XCTD to join Excited Investment DAO (for accredited investors only)
Leverage DAO and copy-investors' buying power for favorable terms from top projects
Increase allocation, personal buying power, and project support by building a Copy-investor community
Participate in governance to curate and decide on the best investment projects

footerText: Building the biggest <1>Investment Platform</1> in the market
